i_plant_dense_planting_advice.text_template: Plant as densely as possible. The more plant mass you have, the safer your tank will be.

i_plant_epiphytes_advice.text_template: Planting Epiphytes (Anubias/Buce): Glue or tie them to hardscape. If you bury the rhizome in the substrate, they will rot.

i_plant_mist_during_setup.text_template: Keep a spray bottle handy and mist plants during setup so they don't dry out.

i_plant_prep_remove_wool.text_template: Remove pots and rock wool from plants, then gently rinse the roots.

i_plant_stems_advice.text_template: Planting Stems: Trim the bottom inch off and remove lower leaves. Plant in small bunches to encourage new root growth.

t_plant_epiphytes_attach.text_template: Plant your Epiphytes on hardscape. Glue or tie them; never bury the rhizome.

t_plant_root_tabs_insert.text_template: Insert root tabs deep into the substrate beneath your heavy root feeders.
